ygData.subject: Re: some info
ygData.msgSnippet: As for the permafrost clue.  There is gnome located underneath the water in everfrost.  It was once rumored that this was a necromancer city, but to the best
ygData.messageBody:
As for the permafrost clue. There is gnome located underneath the water
in everfrost. It was once rumored that this was a necromancer city, but
to the best of my knowledge this is false. There are some skeletons
around him, but I really don't know what he says or what he drops if you
kill him.

Big Dave wrote:

> On the third book:I know a gnome on my server (Fennin Ro) named
> Renten I think, that was utterly obsessed with finding the third
> book. He said he found clues that led him to Permafrost where he had
> been searching for the past several days (and he was level 8 at the
> time). I'm convinced he is on to something, nobody in their right
> mind would risk that kind of venture without good reason. However, I
> have not heard anything from him in several weeks, he may have given
> up or lost his level many times, I don't know. But I'm going back
> there to do some more exporing myself.

--Eron
aeron@...

from The Simpsons:

Mulder: There's been another unsubstantiated UFO sighting in the
heartland of America. We've got to get there right away.
Scully: Well, gee Mulder, there's also this report of a shipment of
drugs and illegal weapons coming into New Jersey tonight.
Mulder: I hardly thing the FBI's concerned with matters like that.
